_comment: Sample GloBI dataset descriptor. See http://github.com/globalbioticinteractions for more information.
citation: Balvín, O., Munclinger, P., Kratochvíl, L., & Vilímová, J. (2012). Mitochondrial DNA and morphology show independent evolutionary histories of bedbug Cimex lectularius (Heteroptera: Cimicidae) on bats and humans. Parasitology Research, 111(1), 457-469.
